item.title: AMC Theatres Movie Tickets Will Be Available on Fitness Membership Program ClassPass
item.description: ClassPass, a subscription service that offers a slew of discounted fitness classes, is expanding into the world of entertainment. Starting on Tuesday, members will be able to redeem credits for movie
